text: Robert Alexander Schutzmann (6 May 1924 â€“ 19 January 2015) was an Austrian- born British inventor and television presenter. He was known for his works in Tomorrow's Land and on model railways. Symes was known for his relaxed and gentle but well-informed style on his shows. Symes was born in Vienna, Austria. Symes died in west Wales from cancer, aged 90. ==Other websites== * Category:1924 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in Wales Category:British inventors Category:British television producers Category:Austrian businesspeople Category:People from Vienna
title: Bob Symes
